name: Debit Card
description: Now comes the Visa Debit Card from Bravo Bank. Your life, therefore, becomes hassle-free and safe; and it is Visa Electron branded, which makes you the proud owner of a meaningful plastic.
features: More convenient and safer than checks
eligibilities: Top Up: Allowable after 3 months (Minimum BDT 1 Lac)

name: Credit Card
description: A credit card is a type of credit facility, provided by banks that allow customers to borrow funds within a pre-approved credit limit. It enables customers to make purchase transactions on goods and services. The credit card limit is determined by the credit card issuer based on factors such as income and credit score, which also decides the credit limit.
features: More convenient and safer than checks
eligibilities: Top Up: Allowable after 3 months (Minimum BDT 1 Lac)
